SEARCH
Package com.gcu.agms.service.impl

Class JdbcUserService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.agms.service.impl.JdbcUserService
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service("jdbcUserService") @Primary public class JdbcUserService extends Object implements UserService
JDBC implementation of the UserService interface. This service provides the core business logic for user management in the AGMS system. It sits between the controllers and repositories, implementing the application's user management rules and workflows including: - User registration with validation and password encoding - Password security using Spring Security's PasswordEncoder - User search and retrieval operations - User profile updates with partial data support - User deletion with proper verification The service follows Spring's best practices: - Dependency injection for repositories and utilities - Clear separation of concerns (validation, data access) - Proper exception handling and logging - Transactional integrity for database operations

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(UserModel newUser)
      Registers a new user in the system with validation and security measures. This method: 1. Validates the user input data for completeness and format 2. Checks for username uniqueness to prevent duplicates 3. Sets creation and update timestamps for auditing 4. Securely encodes the password before storage 5. Persists the validated user to the database
      Specified by:
      registerUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      newUser - The user model containing registration details
      Returns:
      true if registration was successful, false if validation failed or username exists

    • findByUsername

      public Optional<UserModel> findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username. This method: 1. Validates the input username 2. Trims whitespace to prevent lookup errors 3. Delegates to the repository for data retrieval
      Specified by:
      findByUsername in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      username - The username to search for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the user if found, empty Optional otherwise

    • getAllUsers

      public List<UserModel> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users in the system. Typically used for administrative functions.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsers in interface UserService
      Returns:
      List of all registered users

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser(Long id)
      Deletes a user from the system by their ID. This method: 1. Verifies the user exists before attempting deletion 2. Performs the deletion operation through the repository 3. Handles any exceptions that occur during the process
      Specified by:
      deleteUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user to delete
      Returns:
      true if deletion was successful, false if user not found or error occurred

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser(UserModel userModel)
      Updates an existing user's information with intelligent merging. This method: 1. Validates the provided user data 2. Retrieves the existing user record to preserve unchanged fields 3. Selectively updates provided fields while keeping existing data 4. Handles password changes with secure encoding 5. Updates audit timestamp for change tracking
      Specified by:
      updateUser in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userModel - The updated user information (may be partial)
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false if validation failed or user not found

    • validateUser

      private boolean validateUser(UserModel user)
      Validates a user model for data integrity and security requirements. This method performs comprehensive validation: 1. Checks for presence of required fields 2. Validates email format using regex pattern 3. Validates phone number format 4. Enforces password complexity requirements - Minimum length of 8 characters - Contains at least one uppercase letter - Contains at least one lowercase letter - Contains at least one digit - Contains at least one special character The validation logic adjusts based on whether this is a new user registration or an update to an existing user.
      Parameters:
      user - The user model to validate
      Returns:
      true if all validation checks pass, false otherwise
